stimulusHtml: Which of the following integrals gives the length of the graph y = sin ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DD9@ between x = a and x = b, where 0 < a < b ?
choicesHtml: ∫ a b x+ cos 2 ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4343@ dx

∫ a b 1+ cos 2 ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4301@ dx

∫ a b sin 2 ( x )+ 1 4x cos 2 ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BDD@ dx

∫ a b 1+ 1 4x cos 2 ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@45C5@ dx

∫ a b 1+ cos 2 ( x ) 4x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@450A@ dx
